shrimp.name: HanrahanKrueger
shrimp.description: Matt Pharr implementation of Hanrahan-Krueger model
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Based on Matt Pharr's skin shader, a surface shader that implements a shading model that should have a visual appearance generally similar to that of skin. Based on phenomenological information about skin reflectance from Hanrahan and Krueger Reflection from layered surfaces due to subsurface scattering.
